version_description:
Time for ‘Dream Home Match’ update!
Here’s what’s new!

AVAILABLE IN 5 LANGUAGES
* German, French, Portuguese, Traditional Chinese, Simplified Chinese.

MATCH-3 UPDATES
* 30 new levels

OTHERS:
* Performance enhancements
* Graphics optimization
* Bug fix

Remember to download the latest version to enjoy all the new content!

Time for ‘Dream Home Match’ update!
Here’s what’s new:

AVAILABLE IN 5 LANGUAGES
* Japanese, Korean, Russian, Italian and Spanish

NEW EVENT - HAWAII TRIP
* Follow Ralph and Betty, pass through the levels and enjoy the best views in Hawaii. Play to win fabulous prizes!

MATCH-3 UPDATES
* 140 new levels

STORYLINE UPDATES:
* New episodes to follow in the garden

OTHERS:
* Bug Fix
* Graphics optimization
* stability improvements
* Performance enhancements

Remember to download the latest version to enjoy all the new content!
